original_text: And there shall be a unique day, which is known to the Lord, neither day nor night, but at evening time there shall be light.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아시는 한 날이 있으리니 낮도 아니요 밤도 아니라 어두워 갈 때에 빛이 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: And there shall be a unique day
which is known to the Lord
but at evening time there shall be light
